info.title: ClassnoteX API
info.description: Backend API for ClassnoteX - AI-powered recording and transcription app.

get.description:
Get Asset Manifest for a session.
Tells client what exists and its status.

post.description:
Generate Signed URLs for requested assets.
Handles legacy text assets by serving them directly or uploading to GCS on-demand (TBD).
For now: Signed URLs for GCS, direct content for text (via special internal URL or data URI?).
User requirement: "resolve -> URL".

Idempotent generation trigger.
If asset is missing or failed, triggers generation task.
If ready or processing, does nothing.

Upload a transcript artifact from device (or other source).
If mode is device* or dual, this may update the main transcript.

patch.description: セッションの部分更新（タイトル、タグなど）

post.description: 指定ユーザー（基本はリクエスト本人）のカレンダーにセッションを同期登録する。

文字起こし＋話者分離セグメントをアップロード。
iOS オンデバイス STT で完結した場合、segments と source="device" を送信。
クラウド STT/diar コストを 0 にできる。

patch.description:
ユーザーごとのセッションメタデータ（ピン留め、既読など）を更新する。
コピーなし共有設計に対応。

get.description:
Fetch a specific job status by its ID.
Used for polling status of async operations.
Alias for /highlights logic but under /artifacts namespace.

post.description:
Retry cloud transcription.
Only allows retrying if not currently pending/running.

Trigger batch transcription (alias for /transcription/retry).
Used when transcript is missing or needs regeneration.
クイズ回答を送信し、正誤判定と統計更新を行う。

get.description:
Get a signed URL for audio playback/download.
Returns compression metadata (codec, container) to help client decode.

post.description: オーディオアップロード用の署名付きURLを発行する。

get.description: QA 結果を取得する（ポーリング用）。

Get summary of users this session is shared with.
Only accessible by the session owner.

schema.title: Response Get Shared Users Sessions  Session Id  Shared With Users Get

get.description:
Get summary of users this session is shared with.
Only accessible by the session owner.

schema.title: Response Get Shared Users Sessions  Session Id  Members Get

get.description:
Get public profiles of all participants (including owner) in the session.
Accessible by any participant (owner, editor, viewer).

schema.title: Response Get Participants Users Sessions  Session Id  Participants Users Get

post.description: セッション共有用6桁コードの発行（有効期限付き）
6桁コードでセッションに参加する。

Step 1: Prepare image upload. Generates signed URL and records pending state.
Limits to max 3 images (ready or pending) per session.
Step 2: Commit image upload. Verifies file exists in GCS and marks as ready.

get.description: Get ready image notes with signed URLs.

schema.title: Response List Image Notes Sessions  Session Id  Image Notes Get

delete.description: Delete image note from Firestore and GCS.

schema.title: Response Search Users Users Search Get

delete.description:
[ASYNC] Request account deletion.
Triggers a background task to completely wipe all user data (Sessions, Files, Auth).

get.description: ユーザーの現在の権限状態を返す (StoreKit 2 / billing flow対応)

schema.title: Response Users Lookup Users Lookup Get

post.description:
iOSクライアントからのStoreKit 2購入状態を受け取り、プランを更新する。
1. App Store Server API (JWS) 検証 (Robust)
2. クライアント信頼 (Fallback/MVP)

iOSクライアントからのStoreKit 2購入状態を受け取り、プランを更新する。
1. App Store Server API (JWS) 検証 (Robust)
2. クライアント信頼 (Fallback/MVP)

get.description:
プランに応じた機能フラグ・制限情報を返す。
クライアントはこれを信じてUIを制御する。
iOS互換エイリアス: /users/me/usage → /usage/me/summary

post.description:
Record user consent to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
Stores in Firestore subcollection for audit trail.

get.description:
Universal Links Fallback Page.
If the app is installed, the link 'https://deepnote.app/s/{token}' should open the app directly.
If not installed (or failed), this HTML page is shown.

Share Link Fallback (Proposal B):
If opened in browser (no app installed), redirect to App Store.
App with Universal Links will capture this URL and call /share/{token}/info instead.
Endpoint for the App to resolve token to sessionId.

Public read-only session detail view for App (Universal Links).
No Authentication required (Token is key).

Search sessions with filters.
Note: Firestore requires composite indexes for complex filtering.

parameters.name: q

schema.description: Query text (title match or simple search)
schema.title: Q

parameters.description: Query text (title match or simple search)

schema.title: Response Search Sessions Search Sessions Get

get.description:
Search tasks assigned to or owned by user.
Assumes `tasks` root collection exists with `userId` or `assignee` fields.

schema.title: Response Search Tasks Search Tasks Get

get.description:
Search decisions extracted from sessions.
Assumes `decisions` root collection? Or `summaries` collection query?
User spec: "3.4 summaries / tasks / decisions". 
Usually decisions are inside `summary` object or separate.
If separate `decisions` not strictly defined as root collection, we might check `summaries`.
User Spec 4.6 says: GET /search/decisions.
Let's assume we maintain a `decisions` collection or query Summaries.
For MVP, let's query `sessions` and extract decisions? No, that's heavy.
Let's assume we query 'summaries' collection if it exists?
Schema 3.4 says `summaries/{sessionId}`. It's 1-to-1 with session? Or root collection `summaries`?
If root `summaries` collection exists, we can query it.

schema.title: Response Search Decisions Search Decisions Get

get.description:
ダッシュボード用のKPIとチャートデータを返す。
本来は ops_aggregates_daily を参照すべきだが、
初期実装として ops_events を直近分クエリして簡易集計する。
ops_events を検索・一覧表示する。
ユーザー詳細：基本情報 + 統計 + 直近イベント

post.description:
ユーザーへのアクション（隔離、BANなど）
Body: { "action": "quarantine", "durationMinutes": 60, "reason": "Abuse" }

get.description: セッション詳細：基本情報 + ジョブ履歴 + 関連イベント

post.description: [vNext] Verifies if a YouTube video has available transcripts before import.

get.description: Get an ad placement for the given slot (e.g., 'summary_generating').

post.description: Track ad events (impression, click, dismiss).

schema.title: Response Get Session Quiz Stats Analytics Quiz Sessions Get

post.description:
Admin-only: Backfill usage data from sessions collection.
Scans all sessions and populates user_daily_usage.

get.description:
Get the current user's usage summary for a date range.

Useful for:
- Showing usage dashboard in the app
- Checking quota usage
- Billing purposes

parameters.name: from_date

schema.description: Start date (yyyy-MM-dd). Defaults to 30 days ago.
schema.title: From Date

parameters.description: Start date (yyyy-MM-dd). Defaults to 30 days ago.

get.description: Admin endpoint to view any user's usage.
時系列データの取得（グラフ用）。

CloudUsageReport.title: CloudUsageReport
CloudUsageReport.description:
[vNext] Monthly Cloud Transcription Quota Report
Used to inform the UI about remaining minutes and sessions.
